definition: to go on a mental journey

sentences.english: Liezi mankind's dream, as a fugue.
sentences.chinese: 列子把人类的梦，看成是神游。

sentences.english: To meditate on the Shadow is a serious thing.
sentences.chinese: 神游窈冥昏默之乡是一件严肃的事。

sentences.english: He sat at his drafting table, and did nothing.
sentences.chinese: 制图桌前，他静若处子，神游于外。

sentences.english: Though I've never seen the Long River, its greatness and beauty often appeared in my dreams.
sentences.chinese: 虽不曾看见长江美，梦里长神游长江水。

sentences.english: Jim has become a real desk potato.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆已经成了不折不扣的“桌边神游族”。

sentences.english: That is the all forgotten ambit of your leisureliness in it .
sentences.chinese: 身处其中，悠然自在，神游万里而至物我两忘之境界。

sentences.english: Give up on gaming and troll on forums and play with cats instead.
sentences.chinese: 不玩游戏，改为边逗猫眯边在论坛神游。

definition: to travel/to go on a tour/to roam
abbr. for 天津外國語大學|天津外国语大学[Tian1 jin1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]
to wander (typically of an errant priest)
soul brothers/friends in spirit who have never met/to commune with
to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
